name: Tuna-Stuffed Mushrooms
author: Jessica MacClure Dermody
summary: Creamy tuna tossed with Swiss cheese stuffed into button mushrooms and baked into perfection.
ingredients: 2 (3 ounce) cans white tuna in water, drained
salt and ground black pepper to taste
1 (8 ounce) package fresh white mushrooms, cleaned and stems removed
directions: Preheat an oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Combine the tuna, Swiss cheese, mayonnaise, sweet relish, dried onion, onion powder, salt, and pepper in a large bowl
Fill mushroom caps with the tuna mixture; place on baking sheet
Bake in preheated oven until the mushrooms are soft and begin to give up their juices, 20 to 25 minutes
